attributes.action: petition road users to be more responsable at peak travel times when using multi lanes roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: offer all drivers detailed information on how there improved use of these roads can and will alleviate a large portion of current congestion which will enable our government more time to exhaust all avenues regarding the larger issue of congestion and predicted increased vehicle numbers. This should be compulsory training for business users ie; reps and haulage firms.
